name: multiplication
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U or C ]
  mathematics
  specialized the process of adding a number to itself a particular number of times, or a calculation in which this is done: I was good at maths and had no trouble with multiplication and division. They started doing even longer multiplications. Compare
addition
division (CALCULATION)
subtraction
[ U ] the process of increasing in number by a large amount, or of making something increase like this: This type of drug prevents cell multiplication. The multiplication of good brasseries has been a breath of fresh air to the restaurant industry. See
multiply
More examplesFewer examplesI asked the students to write about how multiplication and division were alike and different. When presented with simple multiplication or addition problems, I do them in my head.Interferons appear to inhibit the multiplication of viruses within cells.A pot of face cream is a haven for bacterial multiplication.
